_sText:
The bears have smelt your picnic and they want to steal it defend your picnic from 6 waves of bears to win. If they reach your picnic you loose. Headshots deal double damage. Map Sposored by Poohbuhhrrr and wouldn't exist without him so thank him.(more versions of this will be released for different player amounts, some already exist on my server will add others to this website in future) Hard version works best with 11-18 players any more than that will make it easy.

Set for up to 32 spawns
Please contact me before decompiling or using anything in here at Tomgreen's|Mini Game|Fast DL|Great Job server 76.73.27.235:27015
and my steam id would be Tomgreen STEAM_0:0:7598918
Please leave comments on the map so I know if you liked it in order to work on simular ideas ect..
